content: *this cozy afghan adds a great splash of color anywhere lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70139ad corrections applied feb 23 2008 skill level easy level 2 vanna s choice® article #860 8 colors 1 ball each *purple olive rust dusty rose brick chocolate dusty blue pea green* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm one square = 8 x 8 in 23 x 23 cm special stitches beg cluster beginning cluster cluster cluster work 30 squares 8 color sequences provided sew squares together in 5 row of 6 squares each work crochet edging to finish also available on joann com p448338 vanna s choice 8-color afghan 1 also available in other lion brand yarns 90090ad calypso afghan 2 schematic provided nature s choice organic cotton 81020ad barcelona throw 3 schematic provided cotton-ease 1 http //www joann com/vannas-choice-8-color-afghan/p448338 html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/calypso-afghan 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/barcelona-throw
